author: Reuters Editorial
title: Navios Maritime Partners L.P. Announces Distribution Policy
text:
Navios Maritime Partners Lp:
* NAVIOS MARITIME PARTNERS L.P. ANNOUNCES DISTRIBUTION POLICY AND AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE 2005-BUILT PANAMAX
* NAVIOS MARITIME PARTNERS LP - ‍ AGREED TO ACQUIRE A 2005-BUILT PANAMAX VESSEL FOR $12.95 MILLION, WITH DELIVERY EXPECTED IN MARCH 2018​
* NAVIOS MARITIME PARTNERS LP - ‍ ADOPTED A DISTRIBUTION POLICY OF $0.08 PER COMMON UNIT ANNUALLY​
* NAVIOS MARITIME PARTNERS LP - ‍ 2005-BUILT PANAMAX VESSEL IS EXPECTED TO GENERATE APPROXIMATELY $3.2 MILLION OF ANNUAL EBITDA​
* NAVIOS MARITIME PARTNERS-NAVIOS PARTNERS EXPECTED TO FINANCE DEAL WITH CASH ON BALANCE SHEET,BANK DEBT AT TERMS SIMILAR TO EXISTING BANKING FACILITIES Source text for Eikon:
